想问下各位参与开源项目的途径一般是怎么样的？

megaease /

      easegress---A Cloud Native traffic orchestration system

PowerShell /

      PowerShell---PowerShell for every system!

zxbu /

      webdav-aliyundriver---阿里云盘(https://www.aliyundrive.com/) 的webdav协议开源实现

ThePrimeagen /

      refactoring.nvim---The Refactoring library based off the Refactoring book by Martin Fowler

ventoy /

      Ventoy---A new bootable USB solution.

tharsis /

      ethermint---Ethermint is a scalable and interoperable Ethereum, built on Proof-of-Stake with fast-finality using the Cosmos SDK.

public-apis /

      public-apis---A collective list of free APIs

fuzhengwei /

      small-spring---🌱《 Spring 手撸专栏》，本专栏以 Spring 源码学习为目的，通过手写简化版 Spring 框架，了解 Spring 核心原理。在手写的过程中会简化 Spring 源码，摘取整体框架中的核心逻辑，简化代码实现过程，保留核心功能，例如：IOC、AOP、Bean生命周期、上下文、作用域、资源处理等内容实现。

ytdl-org /

      youtube-dl---Command-line program to download videos from YouTube.com and other video sites

bitcoin /

      bitcoin---Bitcoin Core integration/staging tree

EbookFoundation /

      free-programming-books---📚 Freely available programming books

rust-lang /

      rust---Empowering everyone to build reliable and efficient software.

mgulener /

      turkiye-regex-kaliplari---Türkiye'de kullanılan bazı kalıpların regex kodları

tauri-apps /

      tauri---Build smaller, faster, and more secure desktop applications with a web frontend.

builtbybel /

      ThisIsWin11---The real PowerToys for Windows 11

kon9chunkit /

      GitHub-Chinese-Top-Charts---🇨🇳 GitHub中文排行榜，帮助你发现高分优秀中文项目、更高效地吸收国人的优秀经验成果；榜单每周更新一次，敬请关注！

mooseIre /

      update_miui_ota---

danistefanovic /

      build-your-own-x---🤓 Build your own (insert technology here)

neovim /

      neovim---Vim-fork focused on extensibility and usability

jackfrued /

      Python-100-Days---Python - 100天从新手到大师

lydiahallie /

      javascript-questions---A long list of (advanced) JavaScript questions, and their explanations ✨

trekhleb /

      javascript-algorithms---📝 Algorithms and data structures implemented in JavaScript with explanations and links to further readings

PaddlePaddle /

      PaddleGAN---PaddlePaddle GAN library, including lots of interesting applications like First-Order motion transfer, wav2lip, picture repair, image editing, photo2cartoon, image style transfer, and so on.

swc-project /

      swc---swc is a super-fast compiler written in rust; producing widely-supported javascript from modern standards and typescript.

tiimgreen /

      github-cheat-sheet---A list of cool features of Git and GitHub.
